mapper.insert: insert into activiti_application(userid , title , path , status , templateid , processinstanceid) values(#{userId} , #{title} , #{path} , #{status} , #{templateId} , #{processInstanceId})
mapper.select: select A.id as application_id , A.userid as user_id , A.status as application_status , U.name as user_name from activiti_application A inner join activiti_user U on A.userid=U.id
